&#3939;&#3962;&#3936;&#3956;: [2804] ... 1) dum bu/ ... chos gos kyi le'u/ ... 2) brtag pa dang rab byed/ ... le'u'i grangs/ ... le'ur byas pa/ ... le'u dang po/ ... le'u bar ma/ ... tshig le'ur byas pa/ ... le'ur bcad pa/ ... ming gi rnam grangs la skabs dang/ cho ga / cho ga zhib mo/ rtog pa/ brtag pa/ dum bu/ 'dus pa/ rab tu brtag pa/ rab phyed/ rab byed/ sarga bcas so/ 3) mngal gyi byis pa/ ... le'u'i lha/ ...
